description: Try our easy to follow Moroccan Chicken with Roasted Vegetables & Chickpeas recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Moroccan Chicken with Roasted Vegetables & Chickpeas Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1kg sweet potato, peeled, cut into 6cm pieces
2 zucchini, trimmed, halved lengthways, cut into 2cm thick slices
2 oranges, both zested, 1 cut into wedges, 1 juiced

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Combine seasoning, salt, paprika and pepper in a small bowl. Zest both oranges and reserve. Remove white pith from 1 orange and cut into 12 wedges. Reserve remaining orange.

Combine half the wedges with 1 tsp of spice mix and garlic. Place chicken into a roasting pan. Place spiced orange wedges inside chicken and secure legs with twine. Rub remaining spice mix over chicken. Cook in oven for 20 minutes.
Coat sweet potato with 1 tbs oil. Add to pan with chicken and cook in oven for 30 minutes.
Meanwhile, squeeze juice from remaining orange. Combine zucchini, chickpea, raisin and remaining orange wedges in a bowl. Stir in juice and remaining oil. Add to chicken. Cook for 30 minutes.
Place almonds onto a baking tray. Roast for 8 minutes or until golden. Sprinkle almonds, parsley and reserved zest over vegetables. Serve chicken with vegetables.
